title: What is the position of no.8 in numerology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question - What is the position of no.8 in numerology? Answer - I have been researching about the significance and position of different numbers in numerology, and what strikes me the most is the position of no. 8 and I have discovered interesting details about it through this amazing resource that I found. It helped me learn more about it. These are some of what I have discovered.  In Numerology, 8 is the number of wealth, success, leadership and effective organization. The eight is also a worldly number; everything about it is in plain view. Life Path Number 8Was born to lead, and Life Path will provide with opportunities to express God given talents. Will have to learn how to be an effective leader without becoming dictatorial. Success seems almost unavoidable for , but it may not be in the form of finances. Indeed, success may well be measured in terms of accomplishments, which could take on historical proportions. Career wise, is suited for activities requiring drive, ambition, organizational talents, administrative and executive ability, business acumen, clear judgement, and very high potential for financial growth and expansion. Destiny Number 8Is destined to succeed in whatever arena chooses to enter. Was born to lead, and so long as does not become dictatorial should fulfill destiny to its fullest. Stature, recognition, power, influence, and wealth are all possible for one with drive and talents. admires success and has the ambition to attain it for . A big vision combined with intensive, determined effort enables to achieve great things. Personality Number 8The 8 Personality is ambitious, influential and powerful. They radiate strength to the point of seeming larger than life. 8 Personalities are destined to lead others. They are balanced and slightly conservative. Their confidence assures others will have confidence in them as well. The personal power, strength, and charisma radiates gives the appearance of a leader or executive. image and reputation are important to , and does all can to project the image of a winner: successful, prosperous, confident, and capable. seems cool, impartial, able to take control and manage whatever problem arises. possesses much stamina and endurance and will do whatever it takes to overcome obstacles and challenges. In fact, likes to prove to others what can do. wants to move in influential circles, and is attracted to the arenas of politics, business, or finance. Conclusion: While the 8 does represent success, it may also denote failure. With 8 there is no in between, it succeeds beyond expectations or fails miserably. Number eight also represents endurance and the ability to stay on course until the job is done.

There no need to worry much about 8’ number, it is not unlucky or bad but it is a karmic number, it is said people with heavy karmic burden are born under this number so karmic debts are balanced, usually 8 people work very hard but gains are not to the same extent….but that's due karmic balancing…if you feel tough luck follows you in spite of your best efforts then you need to consult a skilled Numerologist who will after checking required details tell you how to tame the number 8…also remember that numerology does not erase karma, it can only help you deal better with challenging situations.
